Title: Directs the department of health and other state departments and agencies to conduct a study on the quality of life and human health impacts of Westchester county airport
Summary: Directs the department of health and other state departments and agencies to conduct a study on the quality of life and human health impacts of Westchester County airport; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of health and other state departments and agencies to conduct a study on the quality of life and human health impacts of Westchester County airport; and to provide for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
